entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for May 18, 2024

summary.caption: “Go back sleep, Thag. … You only dream we live just so long then die.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for May 18, 2024

summary.caption: “My next guest, on the monitor behind me, is an organized crime informant. To protect his identity, we’ve placed him in a darkened studio—so let’s go to him now.”
